title: Simple & Free Contact Widget
shortDescription: A beautiful widget for social links, email & phone.
longDescription:
The Contact Widget plugin will assist you in making your website more user friendly. Let your users contact you via email, chat, phone or social media easily from an accessible & friendly widget.

Main Features:    
💯 100% Free to use.  
🎛 Customize the widget button, position, social and contact links easily.  
✅ All major social media icons, email and phone available.  
🔌 Easy two-click installation without having to signup or pay.  

Here is what it will look like when the widget is open:
![Contact widget plugin demo](https://collectcdn.com/assets/cloudflare/contact-example.png)

Check out https://collect.chat if you need a 100% automated chatbot for your website for lead generation & data collection.
author: Collect.chat Inc.

links.description: Customize what you want in the widget

link.description: Link to your github profile or a repository; as in github.com/link
link.title: Github Link

link.description: The link to your project or profile; as in kickstarter.com/link
link.title: Project Link

message.description: A message dispayed in the widget
message.title: Message

link.description: Your phone number, including the country code and without any symbols ie. numbers only
link.title: Phone Number

links.title: Widget Content

location.description: Where do you want the widget to appear?
location.title: Location
